articles.content: By India Today Entertainment Desk: Bollywood actress Kajol is facing heavy criticism for allegedly using a racial slur during one of her interviews. The video has been going viral on Reddit. It captu… [+1637 chars]

articles.title: Internet goes for a frenzy as Kajol playfully probes about the box office collection of SRK's 'Pathaan' - India Forums
articles.description: Kajol's recent comments of Shah Rukh Khan's Pathaan box office collection has raised eyebrows.
articles.content: The iconic duo of Kajol and Shah Rukh Khan has left an indelible mark on Bollywood cinema with their historic onscreen collaborations spanning three decades. Not only their on-screen chemistry but al… [+1287 chars]

articles.author: India Today Entertainment Desk
articles.title: SatyaPrem Ki Katha box office collection Day 18: Kartik's film nears Rs 80 crore in India - India Today
articles.description: SatyaPrem Ki Katha continues to impress at the box office, garnering praise from the audience. The film is inching towards the Rs 80 crore-mark in India and has already crossed the Rs 100 crore mark globally.
articles.content: By India Today Entertainment Desk: 'SatyaPrem Ki Katha', starring Kartik Aaryan and Kiara Advani, was released on June 29 and has been performing well at the box office. It has been maintaining a ste… [+1833 chars]
